title: Fortnite Adds Among Us Imposters Mode - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.17.21
description:
Blessing and Gary talk about a new Fortnite Limited Time mode, Sea of Thieves hitting 4.8 Million players, and Outriders' People Can Fly not knowing their revenue.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:55 - Housekeeping
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now. It’s me, Greg, and Janet talking about the PlayStation Game of The Year so far! That’s up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
Wednesday at 6am PT we’re waking up and reacting to that Pokemon Presentation.
This week’s Gamescast is coming out Thursday morning and will be your Ghost of Tsushima Director’s Cut review.
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:05:30 - Sea of Thieves is the most popular it’s ever been - Sea of Thieves blog
00:20:15 - People Can Fly doesn’t know how much Outriders sold - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:30:20 - Fortnite’s new mode is basically Among Us - Chaim Gartenberg @ The Verge
00:42:40 - Ad
00:47:10 - Xbox Series X is getting a higher resolution dashboard - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:50:40 - 10 more games are getting Xbox touch controls - Nibel on Twitter
00:53:30 - A fun one: A first-time Metal Gear Solid streamer accidentally discovered a bug that has speedrunners excited - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:58:37 - Out today
00:59:56 - ONE OF THEM ROTATIN’ SEGMENTS: Today, Tuesday August 17th, 2021 is the 1,000th episode of Kinda Funny Games Daily! Congratulations! - Kenny Belou
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Janet and Andy
